name: part_006
file: tmp_【#SSholoX1周年】世界の全てを見せてやろう【お披露目満載！？】 [fzlZDM_M5bk]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Loading screen with the members of holoX discussing what's coming next while waiting for the transition to the 3D stage.
The members appear on a 3D stage and introduce the main attraction: the 'Giant Seesaw' game.
Takane Lui explains the rules of the 'Giant Seesaw' game, involving moving a platform to guide mascots into a goal.
The game 'Giant Seesaw' begins, and the members frantically try to guide the Holoxsa mascots into the moving goal.

subtitles.original: さてさて、これ何ですか？
subtitles.english: Now then, what is this?

subtitles.original: なんか見たことあるよな...
subtitles.english: I feel like I've seen this before...

subtitles.original: これ大丈夫？
subtitles.english: Is this okay?

subtitles.original: あの、皆様しれっとね、我々ちょっと
subtitles.english: Um, everyone, we've been quietly brought

subtitles.original: ヤバいものの目の前に連れてこられてるんだよね。
subtitles.english: in front of something quite dangerous.

subtitles.original: ヤバいってより楽しそうだけど！
subtitles.english: It looks more fun than dangerous!

subtitles.original: 楽しそうでござるね！
subtitles.english: It looks fun!

subtitles.original: え〜でもなんかヤバイ... デカくない？
subtitles.english: Eh, but it looks dangerous... isn't it huge?

subtitles.original: 夢のような... こういうのやってみたいと思ってたんですよ。
subtitles.english: It's like a dream... I've thought about wanting to try something like this.

subtitles.original: 助かるー！
subtitles.english: Glad to hear!

subtitles.original: 嬉しい！
subtitles.english: I'm happy!

subtitles.original: 皆何だと思う？予想して予想。
subtitles.english: What do you all think it is? Guess, guess.

subtitles.original: 皆殿の反応も気にかかるでござる。
subtitles.english: I'm curious about the audience's reaction too.

subtitles.original: 何が起こってんだ？
subtitles.english: What's happening?

subtitles.original: ギロチンって言われてる！
subtitles.english: Someone said 'guillotine'!

subtitles.original: 何でやりたいんだよ！おかしいだろ！
subtitles.english: Why would you want to do that! That's crazy!

subtitles.original: ギロチンでどうやってホロクスさ増やすんや！
subtitles.english: How do you increase Holoxsa with a guillotine?!

subtitles.original: やだでござるね！
subtitles.english: I don't like that!

subtitles.original: 切って、切って、増やす...
subtitles.english: Cut them, cut them, and increase...

subtitles.original: 1を2にして...
subtitles.english: Turn one into two...

subtitles.original: スライムじゃないんだから、ホロクスさは！
subtitles.english: Holoxsa aren't slimes!

subtitles.original: 肝出しバンジー...
subtitles.english: Liver-spilling bungee...

subtitles.original: 「SASUKE」って言われてる。
subtitles.english: They're saying "SASUKE".

subtitles.original: あ〜「SASUKE」ね。やってみたいよね。
subtitles.english: Ah, "SASUKE". You'd want to try that.

subtitles.original: いややってみたいか？いや無理だが。
subtitles.english: Wait, do you really want to? No, it's impossible.

subtitles.original: 跳べるけど...
subtitles.english: You can jump, but...

subtitles.original: これ泣きそうだどな。
subtitles.english: I feel like I'd cry.

subtitles.original: 「そんな〜」って泣いて...
subtitles.english: Crying like "No way~"...

subtitles.original: アスレチック。
subtitles.english: Athletics.

subtitles.original: ね、コメント欄がめちゃスロット民なんだけど。
subtitles.english: Hey, the comment section is full of slot fans.

subtitles.original: いや、やりてえな！やってたな。
subtitles.english: No, I want to do it! We used to do it.

subtitles.original: やりたいでござる！
subtitles.english: I want to do it!

subtitles.original: もっと長々とやりてえよ。1時間やりてえ。
subtitles.english: I want to do it for a long, long time. I want to do it for an hour.

subtitles.original: モグラ叩き！いいね！
subtitles.english: Whack-a-mole! That's good!

subtitles.original: 皆がモグラになって...
subtitles.english: Everyone becomes a mole...

subtitles.original: 誰かが叩く？
subtitles.english: Does someone hit them?

subtitles.original: それぞれに殴られる。それぞれが殴る。
subtitles.english: Everyone gets hit. Everyone hits.

subtitles.original: 日頃の「おらぁ！」っていうのを込めて。
subtitles.english: Putting in our daily "Rah!" feelings.

subtitles.original: 何か恨みが溜まってんのか？大丈夫？
subtitles.english: Are you harboring some grudges? Are you okay?

subtitles.original: ご褒美じゃん、ご褒美！
subtitles.english: It's a reward, a reward!

subtitles.original: いいね！
subtitles.english: Nice!

subtitles.original: そろそろか？そろそろ来るか？
subtitles.english: Is it about time? Is it coming soon?

subtitles.original: 行けるかな？行けるのかな？
subtitles.english: Can we go? I wonder if we can.

subtitles.original: 来たー！
subtitles.english: It's here!

subtitles.original: 見えたか？見えたかこっち！
subtitles.english: Did you see it? Did you see it, this way!

subtitles.original: 見えたー！
subtitles.english: We saw it!

subtitles.original: 見えたかね？見えたかね？
subtitles.english: Did you see it? Did you see it?

subtitles.original: せーの！
subtitles.english: Ready, set...

subtitles.original: 操れ！巨大シーソー！
subtitles.english: Operate! Giant Seesaw!

subtitles.original: シーソーシーソー。ということで、これは何だ？
subtitles.english: Seesaw, seesaw. So, what is this?

subtitles.original: あれ、見たことあるね！
subtitles.english: Hey, I've seen that before!

subtitles.original: 見たことある！これ... 大丈夫なんですかね？
subtitles.english: I've seen it! Is this... okay?

subtitles.original: 大丈夫です！わかんないけど、多分大丈夫でござる。
subtitles.english: It's fine! I don't know, but it's probably fine.

subtitles.original: 記憶をたどると、上からボールが落ちてくる！
subtitles.english: If I recall my memories, balls fall from the top!

subtitles.original: 皆見て、揺れてるぞ！ヤバいぞ！
subtitles.english: Everyone look, it's shaking! This is bad!

subtitles.original: ということで、次は先ほどゲットしたホロクスさを賭けて、このシーソーをね、移動して...
subtitles.english: So, next, we'll bet the Holoxsa we just got, and move this seesaw...

subtitles.original: ...このように。見えたかな？移動すると...
subtitles.english: ...like this. See? If we move...

subtitles.original: おー、すごいすごい！傾く！
subtitles.english: Oh, wow! It tilts!

subtitles.original: 片方でこっちに移動すると... おー、傾くすごい！
subtitles.english: If one side moves this way... oh, it tilts, wow!

subtitles.original: 傾きますので、このようにね移動をして、最後にゴールにホロクスさを入れて！
subtitles.english: Since it tilts, we move like this, and finally put the Holoxsa into the goal!

subtitles.original: おーすごい、動いてるねゴール！
subtitles.english: Oh, wow, the goal is moving!

subtitles.original: 動くゴールになっておりますのでね。4人で力を合わせて...
subtitles.english: It's a moving goal. So the four of us need to work together...

subtitles.original: ホロクスさが出航する！
subtitles.english: The Holoxsa are setting sail!

subtitles.original: ゴールをしたら、1体ゲット！
subtitles.english: If we goal, we get one!

subtitles.original: えっ！ってことは、20倍にできるってこと？
subtitles.english: Eh! Does that mean we can make it 20 times more?

subtitles.original: そうそう、1体で20個！
subtitles.english: Right, right. 20 for each one!

subtitles.original: え、すごいじゃん！えっ、あとじゃあ5個取ったらもう勝ち？
subtitles.english: Wow, that's amazing! So, if we get 5 more, we win?

subtitles.original: そう、勝ち！そうだね、簡単じゃんね！
subtitles.english: Yes, we win! Right, it's easy!

subtitles.original: 制限時間はね、1ゲーム3分になっております。
subtitles.english: The time limit is 3 minutes per game.

subtitles.original: なので100体ね、こちらで目指して頑張っていきましょう！
subtitles.english: So let's aim for 100 here and do our best!

subtitles.original: イエーイ！頑張れー！
subtitles.english: Yay! Let's go!

subtitles.original: ということで、もう準備はいいですか？早速やっていきますけれども。
subtitles.english: So, are you ready? We'll start right away.

subtitles.original: 1ゲーム目行きましょう！皆もね応援しててね！
subtitles.english: Let's go for the first game! Everyone, please cheer for us!

subtitles.original: コロコロ転がってる気分になってね！
subtitles.english: Feel like you're rolling around too!

subtitles.original: ということで、1ゲーム目スタート！
subtitles.english: So, game one, start!

subtitles.original: スタート！落ちてくる？落ちてくる！
subtitles.english: Start! Is it falling? It's falling!

subtitles.original: こっちこっち！行け行け行け！次次頑張れ！
subtitles.english: This way, this way! Go go go! Next, next, do your best!

subtitles.original: 速い！速い！ちょっと難しい、ちょっと早めになってきた。
subtitles.english: Fast! Fast! It's a bit difficult, it got a bit faster.

subtitles.original: まあまあまだまだ！大丈夫！
subtitles.english: Well, well, not yet! It's okay!

subtitles.original: オッケー！行け行け、こっちこっち！結構勢いが付くから！
subtitles.english: Okay! Go go, this way, this way! It gains quite a bit of momentum!

subtitles.original: 速い速い速い速い！こっちこっち！速い！速い！
subtitles.english: Fast fast fast fast! This way, this way! Fast! Fast!

subtitles.original: 速い！速い！こっちこっち！速い！速い！
subtitles.english: Fast! Fast! This way, this way! Fast! Fast!

subtitles.original: 速い！転がる！転がる！おいで、おいで！オッケーオッケー！
subtitles.english: Fast! It's rolling! It's rolling! Come on, come on! Okay, okay!

subtitles.original: 速い！オッケーオッケー！もっともっともっとこっち、もっとこっち！
subtitles.english: Fast! Okay, okay! More, more, more this way, more this way!

subtitles.original: あ、もっとこっち！逃げなくていいんだよ、大丈夫だよ！
subtitles.english: Ah, more this way! You don't have to run away, it's okay!

subtitles.original: 大丈夫だよ！ホロクスさがいるよ！はいはいはい！オッケーオッケー！
subtitles.english: It's okay! Holoxsa is here! Yes yes yes! Okay, okay!

subtitles.original: せーの！ボート、ボート、ボート！と考えたら... でもこっちちょっと...
subtitles.english: Ready, set! Boat, boat, boat! Thinking about it... but this way a bit...

subtitles.original: 行け行け行け！いっぱい頑張れ！
subtitles.english: Go go go! Do your best with lots of them!

subtitles.original: やだー！行け行け！
subtitles.english: No way! Go go!

subtitles.original: すごいすごいすごい！やったやったやった！
subtitles.english: Amazing, amazing! We did it, we did it!

subtitles.original: あ、そんなことしてる場合じゃなくない？
subtitles.english: Ah, isn't this no time for that?

subtitles.original: あ、まだまだ来てる！そうだ、3分だから！
subtitles.english: Ah, more are coming! That's right, it's 3 minutes!

subtitles.original: ちゃんとね！はいはいはい！次次！ここが速くて！
subtitles.english: Properly! Yes yes yes! Next, next! This part is fast!
